name: Mr. Erazer's Revenge
description:
For the GameGen Game Jam 2022. It's our first game and it's broken af. 

Also, you must use Alt+f4 to exit the game.

You have two difficulties:

  • v1 is the hard version.
  • v2 is the easy one.

Controls:

  • Moving: Arrow Keys / WASD
  • Melee attack: J
  • Shield block: K
  • Boomerang: L

Creators:
